title: Building in Tolmie
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Victoria - Rural conditions
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Country life - Psychological aspects
abstract: 'We've got everything we need here.' The story of the Valcich family's love affair with Tolmie. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Mansfield Shire'.
description: The Valcich’s fell in love with Tolmie, in north-eastern Victoria, the moment they saw it – 12 years on, they are still building their dream home on their block of paradise. Little by little they have assembled a unique and sustainable home using timber and stone from their land and a multitude of reclaimed materials. These gentle souls tell us a little bit about what Tolmie means to them and how they have been able to contribute to the community through the CFA and various social groups over the years.
